title: Get the IAM policy for a reservation
description: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a BigQuery reservation. The policy defines which principals have which roles, and is used to view the access control settings for the resource.

objective.narrative: This sample is for developers building automation around BigQuery reservations. For example, a developer might need to fetch the existing policy, add a new user binding, and then set the modified policy. This `getIamPolicy` call is the first step in that common read-modify-write pattern for managing access control programmatically.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_iampolicy_get
regionTags.title: Get the IAM policy for a reservation
regionTags.description: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for a BigQuery reservation. The policy defines which principals have which roles, and is used to view the access control settings for the resource.
